abstract: American Institute of Architects walks back pledge to work with Pres-elect Donald Trump following backlash from local chapters, architecture organizations and publications.
lead_paragraph: The industry group backpedals after a backlash from architects and says it will hold events across the country to promote dialogue.
snippet: The industry group backpedals after a backlash from architects and says it will hold events across the country to promote dialogue....

headline.main: American Institute of Architects Apologizes for Statement of Support for Trump
headline.print_headline: Architects Apologize After Backlash on Trump
